::Epyon::

He moved behind Megatron, beam saber ready. He would not interfear but
he wouldn't let Megatron kill the new Prime either.

::Hot Rod::

The Autobot vetran aimed all weapons at Megatron.
"Do not take him lightly Arkness, he once defeated the great Optimus
Prime with that energy mace in 1984 on Earth."
